m_szDocTitle: Patent US20140227614 - Solid ion conductor, solid electrolyte including the same, lithium battery ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Provided is a solid ion conductor with excellent lithium ion conductivity. [0011] Provided is a solid electrolyte including the solid ion conductor. [0012] Provided is a lithium battery including the solid ion conductor. [0013] Provided is a method of manufacturing the solid ion conductor. [0014] Additional aspects will be set forth in part in the description which follows and, in part, will be apparent from the description. [0015] According to an aspect, a solid ion conductor includes a garnet oxide represented by Formula 1: [0000] L5+x+2y(Dy,E3-y)(Mez,M2-z)Od Formula 1 [0016] wherein L may b
